mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.good_name, g.description, g.stock, g.cost, g.picture, g.is_deleted, g.on_sale, COUNT(o.good_id) AS purchase_count FROM t_good g LEFT JOIN t_order o ON g.id = o.good_id WHERE g.is_deleted = 0 AND g.on_sale = 1 GROUP BY g.id, g.good_name, g.description, g.stock, g.cost, g.picture, g.is_deleted, g.on_sale ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
